medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has been experiencing abdominal pain for 1 week. The pain is diffuse across the abdomen and worsens with eating. The patient has also had urgent liquid stools and experienced a small amount of dry heaves and phlegm. There were no changes in weight, fever, or chills noted. Prior to symptom onset, the patient felt well.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type II diabetes mellitus, hypertension, coronary artery disease, atrial fibrillation, chronic kidney disease, insulin-dependent type 2 diabetes, peripheral vascular disease, thyrotoxicosis, status post bilateral above-the-knee amputations, remote history of cholecystectomy approximately ___ years ago.
medical_history.social_history: The patient does not drink alcohol often and last consumed alcohol a week ago. No foreign travel or insect bites were reported.
